title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Revised CONTRIBUTING.md to reference official contribution docs and updated contribution guidelines.
Fixed conditional rendering of ruleset history and import/export features in documentation.
Added feature flag for ruleset history (GHEC and GHES>=3.19) and updated ruleset management flag.
Removed ruleset history/import/export from GHES 3.17 release notes.
summary:

- Fixed conditional rendering of ruleset history and import/export features in documentation.
- Added feature flag for ruleset history (GHEC and GHES>=3.19) and updated ruleset management flag.
- Removed ruleset history/import/export from GHES 3.17 release notes.
generated_title: Update CONTRIBUTING.md and fix ruleset feature flags & release notes

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Revised CONTRIBUTING.md to reference official contribution docs and updated contribution guidelines.
- Fixed conditional rendering of ruleset history and import/export features in documentation.
- Added feature flag for ruleset history (GHEC and GHES>=3.19) and updated ruleset management flag.
- Removed ruleset history/import/export from GHES 3.17 release notes.

### Title
Update CONTRIBUTING.md and fix ruleset feature flags & release notes
